name: @storagehub-sdk/root
description: Workspace root for StorageHub SDK monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --filter ./core run build && pnpm --filter ./core run build:types && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run build
scripts.test: pnpm run test:core && pnpm run test:msp-client
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter ./core run lint && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter ./core run format && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run format
scripts.format:check: pnpm --filter ./core run format:check && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run format:check
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter ./core run typecheck && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run typecheck
scripts.coverage: pnpm --filter ./core run coverage && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run coverage
